select count(*) from shoes_polishing where ROOM_NUM like CONCAT('%', #{RN}, '%')
and OCCUR_TIME >= #{START_OCCUR_TIME} and OCCUR_TIME <= #{END_OCCUR_TIME}

select * from shoes_polishing where ROOM_NUM like CONCAT('%', #{RN}, '%')
and OCCUR_TIME >= #{START_OCCUR_TIME} and OCCUR_TIME <= #{END_OCCUR_TIME}

select * from shoes_polishing where ROOM_NUM = #{RN} and GUEST_ID = #{GID} and OCCUR_TIME >= #{STARTDATE} and OCCUR_TIME <= #{ENDDATE}
